quotes: He started his recording career in the mid-1990s on the Mexican label Fonovisa
By the turn of the millennium, he made a successful crossover into the mainstream English-language market.
In 2010, Iglesias parted with Interscope Records and signed with another Universal Music Group label, Republic Records
In 2015, he parted ways with Universal Music Group after being there for over a decade.
in October 2022 he was honored with the Top Latin Artist of All Time at the Latin Billboard Awards.

organizations.name: Universal Music Latin
quotes: During this time he also released Spanish albums such as Quizás and 95/08 Éxitos under Universal Music Latin.

organizations.name: Sony Music
quotes: In 2015, he parted ways with Universal Music Group after being there for over a decade. He signed with Sony Music

organizations.name: Sony Music Latin
quotes: He signed with Sony Music and his subsequent albums were to be released two more bilingual albums Final (Vol. 1) and Final (Vol. 2) with Sony Music Latin in Spanish

organizations.name: RCA Records
quotes: He signed with Sony Music and his subsequent albums were to be released two more bilingual albums Final (Vol. 1) and Final (Vol. 2) with Sony Music Latin in Spanish and RCA Records in English.
